description: This source file implements the platform-independent utility function for creating a Simple Client TCP object within the ANSC framework. It contains a single function, AnscCreateSimpleClientTcp, which calls an internal creation function to instantiate the object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateSimpleClientTcp(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of the Simple Client TCP object within the ANSC framework.
